elements.title: 40 Bank Street (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that 40 Bank Street (pictured), a skyscraper in London, has been described as looking like two different buildings fused into one?

elements.title: Gurdev Singh Gill (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Gurdev Singh Gill was the first Canadian physician of Indian descent?

elements.title: site isolation (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that adding the site isolation security feature made Google Chrome use 10 percent more RAM?

elements.title: No Rome (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Filipino musician No Rome took his stage name from people doubting his career choice?

elements.title: Chompi (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that the Chompi Kickstarter campaign was one of the most successful of 2023?

elements.title: Holly Ringland (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that Holly Ringland wrote her second book while stuck in Australia for three years during the COVID-19 pandemic?

elements.title: effective accelerationism (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that adherents of effective accelerationism believe that unrestricted technological progress would be a solution for poverty and war?

elements.title: William Aditya Sarana (Wikipedia — did you know?)
elements.contents: ... that William Aditya Sarana was sworn in as a regional legislator four days before he graduated from university?
